  add_library(runtime.test STATIC win32.cpp)
  target_link_libraries(runtime.test bb.math bb.blitz bb.string bb.stdio bb.stream bb.sockets bb.hook bb.enet bb.runtime bb.system bb.bank bb.system.windows bb.filesystem bb.filesystem.windows bb.timer bb.timer.windows bb.input bb.input.directinput8 bb.audio bb.audio.fmod bb.userlibs bb.event bb.runtime.console bb.unit-test)

  add_library(runtime.test.bin SHARED win32.cpp)
  target_link_libraries(runtime.test.bin runtime.test)

  add_library(runtime.test STATIC mingw32.cpp)

  target_link_libraries(runtime.test.bin runtime.test)
ELSEIF(BB_MACOS)
  add_library(runtime.test STATIC macos.cpp)
  target_link_libraries(runtime.test bb.math bb.blitz bb.string bb.stdio bb.hook bb.enet bb.runtime bb.system bb.system.macos bb.stream bb.filesystem bb.filesystem.posix bb.bank bb.input bb.audio bb.audio.openal bb.event bb.runtime.console bb.unit-test)

  target_link_libraries(runtime.test.bin runtime.test)
ELSEIF(BB_LINUX)
  add_library(runtime.test STATIC linux.cpp)
  target_link_libraries(runtime.test bb.math bb.blitz bb.string bb.stdio bb.hook bb.enet bb.stream bb.filesystem bb.filesystem.posix bb.bank bb.runtime bb.system bb.input bb.audio bb.event bb.runtime.console bb.unit-test)

  target_link_libraries(runtime.test.bin runtime.test)

  target_link_libraries(runtime.test.bin runtime.test)
